about_the_game:
Welcome to the Lore Book!

In this book of 64 pages, you will find descriptions of the land of Idunia, it’s provinces and rulers, it’s customs, faiths and gods.

Read about the creation of the kingdom of Idunia and the great war that preceded it. A war or liberation to some, but of brutal conquest to others.

In this book you will also find severtal stories of characters you will meet in the game 'Lantern of Worlds : Storybook'.
Read about the mighty warrior Brennus, the enchantress Mari, and Marton, hunter of creatures of the night.

With the growing of the game, the lore book will also grow and expand, and more stories and tales will be added!

By purchasing the lorebook, you will help to support and expand the game 'Lantern of Worlds: Storybook!'

You can find the Lorebook in your Steam\Apps\common\Lantern of Worlds - Storybook directory.
